name: The Classic Trench
description: A timeless trench coat crafted from premium water-resistant fabric. Features classic double-breasted design with belted waist.

name: Silk Evening Gown
description: Elegant floor-length gown in luxurious silk. Perfect for formal occasions with its flowing silhouette and refined draping.

name: Italian Leather Bag
description: Handcrafted in Florence from the finest Italian leather. Features gold-tone hardware and spacious interior.

name: Cashmere Knit
description: Ultra-soft cashmere sweater with ribbed details. A wardrobe essential that pairs with everything.

name: Wool Blazer
description: Tailored wool blazer with structured shoulders. Perfect for the modern professional seeking timeless elegance.

name: Midi Wrap Dress
description: Versatile wrap dress in flowing fabric. Flattering silhouette suitable for day or evening wear.

name: Gold Chain Necklace
description: Statement necklace in 18k gold-plated brass. Bold yet refined, perfect for elevating any outfit.

name: Linen Shirt
description: Breathable linen shirt with relaxed fit. Essential summer piece in natural, sustainable fabric.

name: Velvet Cocktail Dress
description: Luxurious velvet dress with elegant draping. Rich texture and sophisticated cut for special occasions.

name: Leather Ankle Boots
description: Classic ankle boots in supple leather. Timeless design with comfortable heel height for all-day wear.

name: Merino Wool Sweater
description: Fine merino wool sweater with classic crew neck. Soft, breathable, and naturally temperature-regulating.

name: Tailored Overcoat
description: Impeccably tailored overcoat in premium wool blend. Sophisticated silhouette with timeless appeal.
